    pycheron.util.getNet¶

    getNet(st, net)[source]¶

    Gets all traces in stream that match a specified network

    Parameters:
    • st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – Obspy stream object
    • net (str) – Name of network, e.g., 7A, 6E, etc.
    Returns:

    Returns new stream object containing specific trace(s) with specified network
    Return type:

    obspy.core.stream.Stream
    getUniqNet(st)[source]¶

    Obtain unique networks within a stream object

    Parameters:st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – Obspy stream object
    Returns:Return a list of unique networks within the stream object
    Return type:list

    Extracts the station name from a SNCLQ id

    Parameters:snclq (str) – snclq id
    Returns:The name of the station
